item.title: Ghost in the Shell - A Testing Horror Story
item.description: Photo by Scott Walsh Disclaimer: This story may never happen in my life. However, it may happen in yours. Rick “So, you are Rick? Nice to meet you.” I’m shaking hands with a middle-aged woman in her office. She is talking to me. She is Madame Q, the QA manager of Y Bank. My name is Rick, 30 years old single male. I’m a test automation specialist.
